item.title: How to Use Kubernetes Configmap
item.description: There’s a ton of material out there on how to use a ConfigMap. In this post I will provide a recap on the basics then I drill into how to protect your secrets! There are a few ways to create a configMap. Here, I cover just two of these ways;--from-env-file and –from-literal. I won’t cover options like from volume.
